title: U-153

U-153
Fate: Sunk on 13 July
1942

U-153 was attacked
by US A-20A Havoc
aircraft of the United
States Army Air
Forces 59th
Bombardment
Squadron (Light) on 6
July 1942 in the
eastern Carribean.
She was sunk 13... ==>

th July 1942 near
Col::n, Panama, not far
from the entrance to
the Panama Canal, by
the United States Navy
destroyer USS
Lansdowne (DD-486).
